name: treatment
description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's treatment at a specific point in the clinical record. A donor can have multiple treatments.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_primary_diagnosis_id
fields.description: Indicate the primary diagnosis event in the clinical timeline that this treatment was related to.

fields.name: treatment_type
fields.description: Indicate the type of treatment regimen that the donor completed.

meta.notes: Depending on the treatment_type selected, additional treatment details may be required to be submitted. For example, if treatment_type includes 'Chemotherapy', the supplemental Chemotherapy treatment type file is required.

fields.name: age_at_consent_for_treatment
fields.description: Indicate the age of donor when consent was given for treatment.

fields.name: is_primary_treatment
fields.description: Indicate if the treamtment was the primary treatment following the initial diagnosis.

fields.name: line_of_treatment
fields.description: Indicate the line of treatment if it is not the primary treatment.

fields.name: treatment_start_interval
fields.description: The interval between the primary diagnosis and initiation of treatment, in days.

meta.notes: The associated primary diagnosis is used as the reference point for this interval. To calculate this, find the number of days since the date of primary diagnosis.

fields.name: treatment_duration
fields.description: The duration of treatment regimen, in days.

fields.name: days_per_cycle
fields.description: Indicate the number of days in a treatment cycle.

fields.name: number_of_cycles
fields.description: Indicate the number of treatment cycles.

fields.name: therapeutic_intent
fields.description: The therapeutic intent, the reason behind the choice of a therapy, of the treatment.

fields.name: response_to_therapy
fields.description: The donors's response to the applied treatment regimen. (Source: RECIST)

fields.name: outcome_of_therapy
fields.description: Indicate the donor's outcome of the prescribed treatment.

codeList: Treatment incomplete due to technical or organizational problems
Treatment stopped due to lack of efficacy (disease progression)
Treatment stopped due to acute toxicity

fields.name: toxicity_type
fields.description: If the treatment was terminated early due to acute toxicity, indicate whether it was due to hemotological toxicity or non-hemotological toxicity.

fields.name: hemotological_toxicity
fields.description: Indicate the hemotological toxicities which caused early termination of the treatment. (Codelist reference: NCI-CTCAE (v5.0))

fields.name: adverse_events
fields.description: Report any treatment related adverse events. (Codelist reference: NCI-CTCAE (v5.0))
